Ragnar: Roger that. Hold on a second, I'll transmit something that
could help you.

He sent a tightbeam containing information about the blast that gave
him this mech form.

Ragnar: If you can analyze the space-time signature of this data, this
would be our destination.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "She'll fly all right, if a bit shakily."  Wheeljack is an expert at 
> multitasking; he's used his time to make several many-limbed drone 
> machines to let him accomplish both the repair job and Maxima's new 
> shell at the same time.  The sounds of their efforts can be heard in 
> the background.  "All I really need is enough data to plot a 
> transwarp vector to wherever you're off to."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Ragnar opened a commline with Wheeljack.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Jacky, how is the shuttle? Could she fly again?
> > 
> > He was worried about Vlad now, and that was the first time in his
> > life. Vlad had been the nemesis of his friend and former Khan, 
> Phelan
> > Kell, since Phelan was taken as a bondsman by the Wolves. When 
> Ragnar
> > and Phelan went in exile with the warden half of Clan Wolf, Vladimir
> > stayed behind and became the Khan of the Crusader Wolves.
> > 
> > Now, he just hoped he was still alive. Maybe he was an enemy, but he
> > was also a fellow Clan Warrior.
> > 
> > Once again, he opened a frequency.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Galaxy Commander, I am waiting for an update on the salvage
> > operations. How is the planning going?
> > 
> > Katya rubbed the back of her head.
> > 
> > Katya: Hang on, Ragnar. (To Kup) Do you think we could mount that
> > assault now? From what we know, some Predacons are out in the 
> East...
